short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take care of your eyes day and night using dark theme for Gorgias tools and services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dark Mode for Gorgias will give a fresh look for your interface as well as prevent you from eye strain! 

DARK THEME
The extension allows switching from the default interface of Gorgias to a custom dark theme in a couple of clicks. You can also adjust the brightness and contrast to suit your needs better. 

NIGHT SHIFT
Not all dark themes have a night shift feature, but our extension does. When on, it will invert the blue light that comes from the computer screen to warm. That way, preventing eye strain when working hours in a row. 

You can turn this setting on or off in just one click when needed.
